Articles.Content:
You use YouTube to distribute video of yourself? Cheater. Real videographers only give live performances on Skype.

Edit for below: My timezone is actually a reasonably accurate description of my location, it's really small.

Edited May 23, 2014 by Red Iron Crown
Your location is a timezone. Cheater.
Um....your signature is inspirational? pfff. cheater! Hardcore non-cheaters definitely don't have inspirational signatures.
Your name references another game? Cheater!
You're a space potato! Cheater!

Unattributed Braveheart quote? Cheater. Real posters attribute their quotes.

We need a rule modification for this thread that you have to suggest the non-cheaty way to do it. The more absurdly technology-deficient, the better.
You found a way to do it a non-cheaty way? I think the only way was not replying to this post! Cheater!

Your avatar is composed of things that resemble but are not ellipses?? Cheater! Real players only use degenerate ellipses (semi-minor axis = 0 and eccentricity = 1 (a.k.a. straight lines)) and one real ellipse on the top on his avatar, so as not to disrespect the sacred Orbital Mechanics.

Edited May 23, 2014 by 50ck37
do not call myself a non-real player
You use math? Cheater. Real players just eyeball it from the hip.

You call Orbital Mechanics' foundations Math?? (and use English constructions that make foreigners google for it?) Ã£â€šÂ·Ã£â€šÂ¿!!! Real players make the adequate distinction between these Science Fields, even knowing about Newton and Calculus and stuff.
You think math is a science? Cheater. Real mathematicians never experiment, they prove.

What? You both used the word "math"? Real players use MATHS instead. Cheaters!

also, rule change is welcome and will be added shortly. Thanks for the suggestion!
What? you typed things after "Cheaters"?! Real players place nothing after it. Cheater!
You're at Potato Industries? Cheater!

You're at Potato Industries? Cheater!

Wha wha what? you didn't follow rule number 2? Cheater! Everyone knows that only cheaters break the rules!

You think math is a science? Cheater. Real mathematicians never experiment, they prove.

You dare to be right when I am wrong? Cheater. Real players always lose when I am around. Haha
You replied to a user that didn't have the last post? Cheater! non-cheaters only reply to the last user or users, like rule number 1 states.
Playing by the rules? Cheating. Good players don't need the hand-holding of easily understood rules.

Doubting the fact that some people here definitely need hand holding? Thou hast cheated! they obviously didn't understand them if they broke them.

(just kidding im not that strict on the rules, they just make for easy cheat accusations )
Apologizing for being a stickler for the rules? Clearly cheating. Real players only apologize for their mistakes, which means never.
You have 4 green reputation bars? CHEATER! You can only have 1!
*faints* *wakes back up* WHAT! Your location implies that there is any form of water on eve? CHEATER! Everybody knows its a type of really dense purple rocket fuel!
Mentioning 2 different users in the SAME SIGNATURE?!? CHEATER!
Underscores in your username? Way to phone it in, cheater. Real usernames aren't afraid of a few spaces.
You're obviously cheating by being around before April 2013.
